sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Taboola.com Ltd. Achieves Favorable Valuation Amid Strong Financial Performance
feed.summary: Taboola.com Ltd. has achieved a favorable valuation, transitioning to a very attractive status due to strong financial performance. Key metrics like a P/E ratio of 71 and a PEG ratio of 0.57, alongside consistent positive results for four consecutive quarters and reduced raw material costs, indicate a competitive market position. This robust financial standing reinforces its attractiveness in the current market landscape.

feed.title: How Taboola’s Shifting Growth Outlook Is Reshaping The Story Behind Its Valuation
feed.summary: Taboola.com has seen a modest increase in its fair value estimate from $4.50 to $4.80, coupled with a slight adjustment to its discount rate, as analysts show cautious optimism about its long-term growth prospects. While revenue growth expectations have only marginally risen, this shift indicates greater confidence in the company's ability to consistently scale its platform. Key factors influencing this outlook include new partnerships and product launches, modest improvements in revenue growth and net profit margin expectations, and significant share repurchases.

feed.title: Taboola (TBLA) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
feed.summary: Shares of Taboola (NASDAQ:TBLA) rose after Rosenblatt initiated coverage with a 'Buy' rating and a $6 price target, suggesting a nearly 50% upside. Rosenblatt countered the perception that Taboola is challenged by Google AI-search, providing a more optimistic outlook. Despite some volatility and past technical sell signals, TBLA has shown an 11.7% gain year-to-date and is trading near its 52-week high.

feed.title: Rosenblatt’s Bullish Initiation on AI Ad Platform Might Change The Case For Investing In Taboola.com (TBLA)
feed.summary: Rosenblatt recently initiated coverage of Taboola.com with a bullish rating, citing its AI-powered platform and strong Q3 2025 results. This endorsement, coupled with Taboola's raised full-year revenue guidance, supports the company's investment narrative around AI-driven advertising and publisher partnerships. The article suggests focusing on the "Realize" platform as a key growth driver, while acknowledging execution risks amidst competition.

feed.title: Rosenblatt’s Bullish Initiation on AI Ad Platform Might Change The Case For Investing In Taboola.com (TBLA)
feed.summary: Rosenblatt recently initiated coverage of Taboola.com (TBLA) with a bullish rating, highlighting its AI-powered content discovery and native advertising platform. This endorsement follows strong Q3 results and an upbeat outlook, reinforcing Taboola's investment case built around its AI-driven advertising and publisher partnerships. The company's "Realize" platform is seen as a key growth driver, with forecasts projecting significant revenue and earnings growth by 2028.

feed.title: Rosenblatt’s Bullish Initiation on AI Ad Platform Might Change The Case For Investing In Taboola.com (TBLA)
feed.summary: Rosenblatt recently initiated coverage of Taboola.com (TBLA) with a bullish rating, driven by the company's AI-powered content discovery and native advertising platform. This endorsement follows strong Q3 2025 results and an upbeat outlook, reinforcing Taboola's investment narrative centered on AI-driven advertising and publisher partnerships. Despite competition, the company's "Realize" platform is seen as a key growth driver, with forecasts projecting significant revenue and earnings growth by 2028.

feed.title: Taboola (TBLA): Weighing Insider Selling and Technical Signals Against a 10% Undervaluation Case
feed.summary: Taboola.com (TBLA) recently experienced a minor dip followed by technical sell signals and insider share sales, despite reporting stronger-than-expected quarterly results and upbeat guidance. The company is considered 10.4% undervalued with a fair value of $4.50 against a current price of $4.03, based on analyst expectations for future earnings and revenue growth. While momentum builds, its high P/E ratio compared to peers suggests potential risk if growth falters.

feed.title: Taboola.com (NASDAQ:TBLA) Now Covered by Analysts at Rosenblatt Securities
feed.summary: Rosenblatt Securities initiated coverage on Taboola.com (NASDAQ:TBLA) with a "buy" rating and a $6.00 price target, suggesting a potential upside of 48.88%. This new coverage comes as Taboola recently reported mixed quarterly results, beating revenue expectations but missing EPS estimates. Insiders have sold approximately 6.81 million shares totaling about $25.0 million over the last quarter, though still retaining a significant stake in the company.

feed.title: Why Taboola (TBLA) Shares Are Sliding Today
feed.summary: Taboola (TBLA) shares fell 3.3% due to a technical sell signal suggesting further declines, compounded by negative insider sentiment with executives selling $44.1 million in shares over the past year. The content discovery platform closed the day down 4.1% at $3.89, despite having reported strong third-quarter financial results and an optimistic forecast a month prior.

feed.title: Taboola (TBLA): Assessing Valuation After New LG Ad Solutions Partnership Targets Stronger Cross-Platform Ad Performance
feed.summary: Taboola.com (TBLA) recently partnered with LG Ad Solutions to launch Performance Enhancer, aiming to link connected TV campaigns with digital results and strengthen advertiser demand. Despite improved momentum and an intrinsic discount estimate, the company faces scrutiny over its margins and return on capital, prompting questions about whether it's an undervalued turnaround or if its growth prospects are already priced in. Valuation models show differing results, with a narrative fair value of $4.50 suggesting modest upside, while a DCF model indicates a more significant undervaluation at $7.76.

feed.title: Globeflex Capital L P Increases Position in Taboola.com Ltd. $TBLA
feed.summary: Globeflex Capital L P significantly increased its stake in Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA) by 67.7%, now owning 881,589 shares worth over $3.2 million. This comes despite significant insider selling totaling over $25 million in the last 90 days, though insiders still hold a substantial 24.70% of the company. Taboola reported mixed Q3 results, missing EPS but exceeding revenue forecasts, with a consensus target price of $4.50.

feed.title: Taboola (TBLA): Assessing Valuation After New LG Ad Solutions Partnership Targets Stronger Cross-Platform Ad Performance
feed.summary: Taboola.com has partnered with LG Ad Solutions to launch "Performance Enhancer," aiming to strengthen cross-platform ad performance and deepen advertiser demand. This collaboration, combined with other initiatives like the "Realize" platform, has led to improving momentum for Taboola, reflected in its recent share price performance. The article explores whether Taboola is currently undervalued, with estimates ranging from a modest upside to a significant discount based on different valuation models, while also addressing key risks and growth assumptions.

feed.title: Arrowstreet Capital Limited Partnership Buys 2,505,249 Shares of Taboola.com Ltd. $TBLA
feed.summary: Arrowstreet Capital Limited Partnership significantly increased its stake in Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA) by 412.1%, acquiring over 2.5 million additional shares and bringing its total holdings to 3,113,200 shares worth $11.39 million. This occurred despite recent insider selling by COO Eldad Maniv and Director Nechemia Peres, who together sold shares worth over $25 million. Taboola recently missed EPS expectations but surpassed revenue estimates, prompting a "Moderate Buy" consensus target price of $4.50 from analysts.

feed.title: How Investors Are Reacting To Taboola.com (TBLA) Expanding GenAI Tools And CTV Performance Partnerships
feed.summary: Taboola.com (TBLA) recently announced new partnerships, including deploying its DeeperDive GenAI answer engine with BuzzFeed Asia and partnering with LG Ad Solutions to power Performance Enhancer. These moves aim to integrate Taboola's Realize platform with GenAI tools and CTV performance advertising. The company's investment narrative now heavily relies on the Realize platform to drive growth and keep the open web relevant for advertisers through measurable, outcome-based campaigns.

feed.title: Taboola Looks to Offset Declining Open Web Traffic With Platform Integrations and Performance Engine
feed.summary: Taboola is addressing the decline in open web traffic with platform integrations and its performance engine. The company's main product is a performance-based advertising widget that uses native ads on webpages and in partner applications to monetize inventory. These native ads are designed to seamlessly blend with surrounding content, often appearing with "As Seen On The Web" banners.

feed.title: Taboola (NASDAQ: TBLA) and LG Ad Solutions tie CTV reach to open-web performance
feed.summary: Taboola (NASDAQ: TBLA) and LG Ad Solutions have partnered to launch "Performance Enhancer," a solution that connects premium CTV exposure to measurable digital conversions. This offering leverages LG's first-party ACR audience data with Taboola's Realize platform and open-web inventory to extend Smart TV campaigns, optimize lookalike audiences, and attribute site visits and conversions to TV exposure. The collaboration aims to provide advertisers with a unified view of ROI across the full consumer journey.

feed.title: Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA) Given Average Rating of "Moderate Buy" by Brokerages
feed.summary: Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA) has received a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from eight brokerage firms, with an average 12-month target price of $4.50. Despite reported insider selling totaling $25.05 million last quarter, institutional investors have been increasing their stakes. The company recently missed EPS estimates but beat on revenue, reporting $496.8 million against expectations of $465.6 million, marking a 14.7% year-over-year increase.

feed.title: Empowered Funds LLC Acquires 530,664 Shares of Taboola.com Ltd. $TBLA
feed.summary: Empowered Funds LLC increased its stake in Taboola.com Ltd. by 73.4% in the second quarter, acquiring 530,664 additional shares to hold a total of 1,253,648 shares, valued at approximately $4.59 million. Despite this acquisition, insiders have been significant sellers of Taboola.com shares recently, with sales totaling over $25 million in the past 90 days. Analyst sentiment towards Taboola.com is cautiously optimistic, with a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating and a target price of $4.50.

feed.title: LSV Asset Management Invests $345,000 in Taboola.com Ltd. $TBLA
feed.summary: LSV Asset Management recently acquired a new stake of 94,390 shares in Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA) worth approximately $345,000 during the second quarter. Despite this institutional investment, insiders have been net sellers, with the COO selling over 400,000 shares and total insider sales over the past 90 days amounting to $25.14 million. Taboola.com currently holds a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from analysts with an average target price of $4.50.

feed.title: Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
feed.summary: Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ: TBLA) reported strong Q3 2025 earnings, exceeding guidance with revenue of $497 million and adjusted EBITDA of $48 million. The company highlighted the success of its "Realize" performance platform, which is driving an "inflection point" in the business and contributing to increased scaled advertisers and average revenue per advertiser. Taboola also discussed increased investments in marketing and AI, and aggressive share repurchases, signaling confidence in future double-digit growth.

feed.title: Taboola.com Ltd. (TBLA) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
feed.summary: Taboola.com Ltd. (TBLA) reported Q3 earnings of $0.11 per share, exceeding the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.1, and revenues of $496.76 million, surpassing estimates by 6.69%. The company has beaten EPS expectations three times and revenue estimates four times over the last four quarters. Despite strong Q3 results, TBLA shares have underperformed the S&P 500 year-to-date, and the stock currently holds a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold).

feed.title: Yahoo and Taboola Partner for the Next 30 years. Partnership to Generate ~$1B Annual Revenue to Taboola and Reach Nearly 900M Monthly Yahoo Users
feed.summary: Taboola has announced a 30-year strategic partnership with Yahoo, which is expected to generate approximately $1 billion in annual revenue for Taboola and reach nearly 900 million monthly Yahoo users. This collaboration aims to provide advertisers with massive scale and sophisticated contextual targeting on the Open Web, while also driving increased demand and revenue for Taboola's publisher partners. The partnership is projected to significantly enhance Taboola's financial performance, improving revenue per share by ~32% and Adjusted EBITDA per share by ~43%.

feed.title: Taboola to Announce Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results on November 5, 2025 - MarketScreener
feed.summary: Taboola (Nasdaq: TBLA) announced it will release its third-quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, November 5, 2025. The company will host a conference call and webcast to discuss these results at 8:30 a.m. ET on the same day. Taboola is a leading performance advertising technology company that works with thousands of businesses and publishers globally.

feed.title: Nov 5, 2025 8:30 AM ET — Taboola to Release Third Quarter 2025 Results; Webcast Available - Stock Titan
feed.summary: Taboola (Nasdaq: TBLA) announced it will release its third-quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, November 5, 2025. Management will host a conference call and webcast at 8:30 a.m. ET to discuss the results. The webcast will be available for replay for one year.

feed.title: Taboola Announces Strong Momentum for Realize, Pushing Beyond Native with Expanded Partnerships with Leading Global Publishers Including TIME, Weather Channel Digital, Gannett | USA TODAY Network, Nexstar, and Slate, Continues to Add New Features for Advertisers to Connect with Consumers on Publisher Sites; Taboola Expects to Pay Over $1.5 Billion to Publishers and OEMs in 2025
feed.summary: Taboola announced a significant expansion of its performance advertising platform, Realize, adding major publishers like TIME and Gannett to its display access offering. The platform leverages AI and code-on-page publisher signals to optimize campaigns across various formats, and Taboola projects to pay over $1.5 billion to publishers and OEMs in 2025. This move aims to provide advertisers with more reach beyond traditional search and social media, boosting performance across Taboola's vast network.

feed.title: Does The Market Have A Low Tolerance For Taboola.com Ltd.'s (NASDAQ:TBLA) Mixed Fundamentals? - 富途牛牛
feed.summary: This article examines Taboola.com's recent stock performance and financial fundamentals, particularly its low Return on Equity (ROE) of 1.5%. The analysis suggests that the company's declining net income over five years is consistent with its low ROE, contrasting sharply with industry growth. Despite high reinvestment, Taboola.com's earnings have shrunk, raising questions about the efficiency of its profit utilization and its future growth prospects.

feed.title: Brokerages Set Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA) PT at $4.50 - Defense World
feed.summary: Brokerages have set a price target of $4.50 for Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA). The article details recent insider selling by Director Erez Shachar and institutional investor activity, including CWM LLC, Atria Wealth Solutions Inc., and Pallas Capital Advisors LLC increasing or initiating stakes. It also provides a company profile for Taboola.com Ltd.

feed.title: Wealth Enhancement Advisory Services LLC Boosts Holdings in Taboola.com Ltd. $TBLA
feed.summary: Wealth Enhancement Advisory Services LLC has increased its stake in Taboola.com Ltd. (TBLA). Several other institutions, including Yelin Lapidot Holdings Management Ltd. and Allianz Asset Management GmbH, have also adjusted their holdings. Additionally, a director of the company sold a significant number of shares, as analysts anticipate future growth for Taboola.com.

feed.title: Taboola (NasdaqGS:TBLA) Valuation in Focus After Launch of DeeperDive AI with India Today Group
feed.summary: Taboola.com recently launched DeeperDive AI with India Today Group, aiming to boost reader engagement and ad revenue in APAC. While analysts consider Taboola undervalued with a fair value of $4.17 driven by new platform expansion, the company's high P/E ratio of 67.4x compared to industry averages suggests potential valuation risk if growth targets aren't met. Investors are left to weigh the bullish expansion narrative against the current high valuation multiples.

feed.title: Taboola Announces Launch of a Native Bidding Service, Facilitating Expansion to Display, Social Networks and Other Platforms to Fuel Even Faster Growth, and Signs New Microsoft Agreement Through July 2024
feed.summary: Taboola has announced the launch of a new native bidding service aimed at expanding its advertiser base to display advertising, social networks, and other platforms. This initiative is supported by a renewed agreement with Microsoft through July 2024, facilitating increased growth and leveraging the open RTB space. The new service is expected to provide more growth opportunities for advertisers and drive higher ex-TAC revenue for Taboola.

feed.title: Taboola.com Ltd.'s (NASDAQ:TBLA) Shares Climb 25% But Its Business Is Yet to Catch Up
feed.summary: Shares of Taboola.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:TBLA) recently rebounded 25% but are still down 19% over the past year. The company's price-to-sales (P/S) ratio of 0.6x is similar to the industry median of 1x, despite revenue growth of 17% in the last year and 24% over three years. However, analyst forecasts predict weaker revenue growth of 8.3% annually for the next three years compared to the industry's 11%, raising concerns that its current P/S ratio might not be sustainable.

feed.title: Taboola Expands Beyond Native Ads with Realize; New Technology Platform Allows Taboola to Serve The Entire Performance Advertising Market, Customers Include Babbel, eToro and More
feed.summary: Taboola has announced Realize, a new technology platform that expands its focus beyond native advertising to serve the entire performance advertising market. This platform aims to provide performance outcomes at scale, leveraging Taboola's data, AI, and diverse inventory across publishers, apps, and OEMs. Realize seeks to address the perceived inefficiencies and diminishing returns in current performance advertising spend on DSPs, niche AdTech solutions, and social media.

feed.title: 6 Questions For Adam Singolda, Founder & CEO, Taboola
feed.summary: Adam Singolda, founder and CEO of Taboola, discusses the company's evolution from its inception in 2007 to its current position as a public company nearing $2 billion in revenue. He elaborates on the strategic partnership with Yahoo, the integral role of AI in Taboola's business model, and how the company is navigating the phasing out of third-party cookies. Singolda also addresses challenges faced by news publishers and highlights Taboola's Turnkey Commerce initiative, including its partnership with the Associated Press.

feed.title: Taboola to Release First Quarter 2024 Financial Results and Host Earnings Conference Call on May 8, 2024
feed.summary: Taboola announced it will release its first-quarter 2024 financial results on Wednesday, May 8, 2024, before market open. The financial release will be followed by a conference call and webcast at 8:30 a.m. ET on the same day. Investors and interested parties can access the webcast or register for the call to hear discussions from Taboola's senior management team.

feed.title: Yahoo to buy minority stake in Taboola in digital ad push
feed.summary: Yahoo is set to acquire a nearly 25% minority stake in Taboola.com Ltd, making it the largest shareholder. This 30-year deal will grant Taboola exclusive rights to sell native ads on Yahoo's platforms and is projected to generate $1 billion in annual revenue, marking a significant push into digital advertising for Yahoo. The agreement aims to boost Taboola's revenue and operating earnings, despite a recent downturn in its quarterly revenue and annual forecast.

feed.title: Native Advertising Examples: 17 of the Best and Most Inspiring Native Ads
feed.summary: This article showcases 17 successful native advertising campaigns by various global brands, highlighting how native ads integrate seamlessly into content to drive engagement, awareness, and sales. It emphasizes native advertising's effectiveness as a non-interruptive and contextually relevant alternative to traditional ads, detailing increased CTRs, lead generation, and ROAS achieved by companies like Adidas, Vodafone, and Square Yards through platforms like Taboola. The article concludes by reinforcing why native advertising is a powerful digital marketing technique, citing its non-disruptive nature and contextual relevance.

feed.title: Taboola Acquiring Netflix Content Recommendation Award-Winning Team, Gravity R&D
feed.summary: Taboola announced its acquisition of Gravity R&D, the award-winning team behind improving Netflix's content recommendation algorithm by 10%. This acquisition is part of Taboola's $100 million annual R&D investment, making Gravity R&D's headquarters in Hungary a new R&D hub for Taboola. The article highlights Gravity R&D's journey from winning the Netflix Prize to establishing their company and the impact of their Yusp personalization technology on clients like N11.
